Text: RE Next Meeting of Drafting Committee Cc If EKT is able to attend we are flexible on the location Marty Marty Jo Rogers Assistant General Counsel EntergyKoch Trading LP th Floor Greenway Plaza Houston Texas Phone Facsimile EMail ATTORNEY COMMUNICATIONS PRIVILEGED CONFIDENTIAL This email and any attachments thereto are intended only for use by the addressees named herein and may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipient of this email you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this email and any attachments thereto is strictly prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify me by telephone and permanently delete the original and any copy of any email and any printout thereof Original Message From Andy Katz SMTP Sent Wednesday October PM To Cc Ed Comer Subject Next Meeting of Drafting Committee I have been unable to confirm a meeting for the week of November at AEP in Columbus I would like to propose an alternative which is to meet in Washington DC on the th ALthough EEIs offices will be closed that day Ed Comer said we could use the meeting space EEI would be unable to arrange any catering however Alternatively we might be able to rely on the good graces of member company Washington counsel Please let me know if the th in DC from works for people Liz Sager says that the collateral annex will be ready for review by then The concern is that if we wait too long we are into the holidays and I think there needs to be a meeting of the working group and a workshop on the collateral annex no later than January Although my last day at EEI is the nd I will be keeping this email address for purposes of communications regarding the EEI Contract Andrew S Katz Director Industry Legal Affairs Edison Electric Institute Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC Voice Fax email mailto File Andy Katzvcf

FW Enron Cc Liz Hope all is well This is a follow up email to the phone message I left you this morning Please see the attached email from Enrons Kimberly Indelicato From the information I have received it appears that this issue has reared its head because we have asked Enron to sign our EEI confirmation when EKT is the Seller I have looked through our executed EEI and I find no amendment addition deletion etc to Article Transaction Terms and Conditions Section Confirmation EKT believes that it is in compliance with Section Specifically Seller may confirm a Transaction by forwarding to Buyer by facsimile within three Business Days after the Transaction is entered into a confirmation Confirmation substantially in the form of Exhibit A EKT believes it has complied with the requirements of Section Please give me a call when you get a chance Marty Marty Jo Rogers Assistant General Counsel EntergyKoch Trading LP th Floor Greenway Plaza Houston Texas Phone Facsimile EMail delivery points are into products TVA Entergy SOCO Cinergy Ameren GTC COMED As per the EEI Agreement under the section of Schedule P the delivery point should read on the confirm for all into products Into Sellers Daily Choice Also PJM Western Hub is not an into product Number Revision Needs to State EntergyKoch Confirm Reads Reason ERCOT ERCOT Undelivered Undelivered no longer exist and we do not sign exercise of options Into SOCO Sellers Daily Choice SOCOGTC Interface This is an Into Product PJM Western Hub Into PJM Western Hub Sellers Choice This is not an Into Product Trade Date MF SSH Trade Date Every Day This trade date needs to be corrected and the trade is offpeak not Into Entergy Sellers Daily Choice Into Entergy Hub Sellers Choice Hub should be left out and Daily inserted Into Indelicato Kimberly Subject Enron Hi Kim I got your message so here is my email address We send any trade that is days or more in delivery period Could you do me a favour Stephanie called me about an option exercise time and I tried to call her back but I dont have her phone number Could you please give me her direct line I kept getting your voice mail and Melissa Murphys Tell her Im sorry Thanks
